attributes.action: Simple solution to MRSA if you agree please sign below
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Its very simple use a ward rotation method. Have one ward free, move the patients to the clean sterile ward then clean the one they came out of then move the next ward into that one, and so on. e.g 4 wards one kept free, take one week to clean each. 

Make fixing etc portable, electrics plug into ceiling points etc so, the ward can be stripped clean bare easier to clean.

They do it with animals on a farm, kennels etc.

rejection.details: Please redraft the main sentence to request a clear action of HM Government.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
